Script.name: Rent Database Creation
Script.script:
db:create( "rents", { storage = { name = "", room = 0, zone = "", item = "", cost = "", timestamp = db:Timestamp("CURRENT_TIMESTAMP"), }, } )
rents = rents or {clear_room = true}
rents.help = [[ <cyan>Rent Script<reset>
This script will track items that you have stored in your rents in a database located at ]] .. getMudletHomeDir() .. [[/Database_rents.db
Below is a brief overview of some commands that this script includes. All commands can be found in the appropriate rents folder under mudlet aliases.
<cyan>Commands:<reset> <yellow>rents show<reset> - Display all items in the rent database <yellow>rents show name character<reset> - Displays all items in the rent database associated with a particular character name. Not case sensitive. Examples: rents show name Adael, rents show name bludlust <yellow>rents show item keyword(s)<reset> - Display all items in the rent database that contain the given keyword(s). Not case sensitive, but if multiple keywords are used the order (and, if applicable, punctuation) matters. Examples: rents show item heron-engraved, rents show item a crystal lightstick <yellow>rents show zone keyword(s)<reset> - Display all items in the rent database whose zone name (in my map data) contains the provided keyword(s). Not case sensitive, but if multiple keywords are used the order (and, if applicable, punctuation) matters. Examples: rents show zone Caemlyn, rents show zone bandar eban, rents show zone thakan'dar
<yellow>rents delete<reset> - Delete the ENTIRE rent database. <red>Use with caution!<reset> <yellow>rents delete name character<reset> - Delete all entries in the rent database for the provided character name. Not case sensitive. Examples: rents delete name Adael, rents delete name bludlust <yellow>rents delete room (roomID)<reset> - Delete all entries in the rent database for the player's current room, or the provided roomID number if one is given. Examples: rents delete room, rents delete room 139
]]

Script.name: Rents Display Echo
Script.script:
function rents:echo(what, debug, err) --colored tags for message echo local main_tag = "<lawn_green>(<green>rents<lawn_green>): <white>" local debug_tag = "<deep_sky_blue>(<royal_blue>debug<deep_sky_blue>): <white>" local err_tag = "<coral>(<red>error<coral>): <white>"
--if debug message and config debug is false, return without echoing if debug and not self.configs.dbug then return end
--if start of message is new line, print that before colored tags of message echo if what:sub(0,1)=="\n" then cecho("\n") what = what:sub(2) end cecho(main_tag) if debug then cecho(debug_tag) end if err then cecho(err_tag) end cecho(what) end

Script.name: System disconnection
Script.script:
function rents:sys_disconnection() rents.name = nil rents.clear_room = true end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysExitEvent", "rents:sys_disconnection") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDisconnectionEvent", "rents:sys_disconnection")
